title: "Chip industry strains to meet AI-fueled demands — will smaller LLMs help?"
excerpt: "Large language models are growing in size, as is the number of companies using generative AI technology. The more the models grow, the more CPUs they consume — exacerbating an already-strained chip supply chain."
